summary: A father tells his son a bedtime story about young Oblio (Mike Lookinland), who believes that having no point in the fantastical kingdom of pointed heads and things, still has a point.
cast: Ringo Starr|Paul Frees|Lennie Weinrib|Bill Martin|Buddy Foster|Joan Gerber|Mike Lookinland|Alan Barzman|Dustin Hoffman|Alan Thicke
title: The Point
